::Slayer::

Slayer growls. "You are a traitor."

His programming prevened him from leaving Prebon with the Preds, and 
he turns to look at the scanner reports once more. "I will disguise 
myself and retrieve him. Its time to do some trick-or-treating."

With that, Slayer walks out of the room and heads for the armory.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius was flustered by the fact that his flawless plan had 
backfired. He
> wanted to be the one to take credit for bringing Prebon back safely. 
His
> anger was broadcast toward the most convenient of targets. "Oh sure, 
we'll
> just rent a few halloween costumes walk up to the Predacon base and 
say
> trick or treat and hope they put Prebon in our bag." he stared at 
Slayer
> with frustration and anger in his robotic glare. "Prebon and the 
others are
> gone, we'll have to take care of ourselves now, not put ourselves in 
further
> jeapordy by taking stupid chances." he kicked the table he'd been 
sitting on
> causing it to crash to the floor, "We may as well pack our bags and 
run like
> hell, we'll at least have a running chance then."

Ignatius

> > > that the Preds saw her at the CF and knew that she was 
affiliated
> > with the
> > > Trainers. He thought long an hard trying to find the solution. 
"I'm
> > fresh
> > > out of ideas" he said beginning to think about cutting thier 
losses.

leave
